name: Ability Constraint
description:
Condition: An Enemy Phantom is Summoned or activates an Ability.
Target a face up Phantom, it cannot activate it’s Abilities while this card is face up on the field.

name: After Life Empty
description:
Special Resurrect every level 2-and-lower Death Phantom card in the AL.
Their Abilities are negated. Their SP is set to zero.

name: Air Elemental
description:
Field Ability: Targeted Dodge Roll.
Balance Ability: This card can Attack Directly.

name: Ancient City
description: Counter cards within the Environment Range are shuffled back into the deck instead of Breaking.

name: Ancient Curse
description:
Condition: Opponent’s Phantom deals damage from a direct attack.
As long as that card remains on the field, at the start of each of your turns, damage the opponent’s Life points equal to the Phantom’s attack points.

name: Aquatic Flip-Flapper
description: Both players select an Ally card to have its current position flipped -- either up or down.

name: Arbian Librarian
description: Condition: Summoned. Search for a Level 2 Life card from your Main Deck.

name: Arbitration
description: If a card you control is Defeated, your opponent cannot declare another Attack this turn.

name: Attack Redirect
description:
Condition: An enemy Card initiates a Direct Attack.
Redirect the Attack.

name: Bail Out
description:
If you were going to take enough damage to lose the game, gain 2500 health.
Once per card.

name: Balancing Of Elements
description:
Condition: An Ally Elemental is Targeted for an Attack.

Field Ability: Redirect that attack to another Ally Elemental. Then flip this card back down. Once per turn.

Balance Slot Ability: Redirect that attack to this card. If this card Breaks from an attack, Break the attacking card.

name: Battle Counter
description:
Condition: An Enemy Card initiates Battle.
Targeted Break.

name: Blood Pact
description: Take 1000 points of damage and give your opponent 1000 Life Points. Draw 1 card.

name: Blow Back
description: If a Phantom attacks one of your cards in Defense Position, the opponent then takes damage equal to the Health of the Phantom that was attacked.

name: Break Everything
description:
Select a Destruction Phantom Card from your hand or field to Break, Targeted Break a card.
AL Ability: Target any number of Destruction Phantom’s in your AL to Destroy.
Break that many cards from the top of your opponent’s deck.

name: Break Stop
description:
Condition: An Ally card is Targeted for a Break by an Ability.
Negate the Break.

name: Brilliance Custodian
description:
Cycle.
1-AP Per Round.
● AP: Targeted Deal 500 Damage.
● AP: Give an Ally Light Phantom Shielding.
● AP: Lose 2 Levels and then Draw.

name: Budding Rascal
description: Condition: Have an Ally level 2 or lower Life Phantom. Special Summon this card. It’s Field level becomes zero.

name: Call To Oblivion
description:
Condition: An Enemy Phantom Attacks an Ally Destruction Card.
The Attacking Phantom takes 200 Damage for every Card in Oblivion.
If that card would Break from this Ability, it is Destroyed.

name: Chance Counter
description:
When an Ally card is targeted for an Attack, you can flip a coin for every face up Chaos card on the field.

Apply the following for each correctly called coin flip.
1: Negate the attack.
2: Deal damage to the opponent equal to the Attacking Card.
3: Break the Attacking Card.

name: Channeling Chaos
description:
On activation: Add a counter to this card for every face up Chaos Card on the field.
Starting next turn, every turn each Player gains SP equal to this card’s counters.

name: Chaos Thriver
description: On Summon: This card gains 200 Stats for every face up Chaos Card.

name: Chaotic Phantom Swap
description:
Target a Chaos Phantom and an Enemy Phantom of equal or less SP, swap control of the selected cards.
You can re-activate this Ability up to the number of Chaos Phantom Cards you controlled during this card’s activation.

name: Chaotic Stat Swap
description:
Every face up Phantom on the field has its Attack and Health Swapped.
Chaos Phantoms can choose to not have their stats swapped.

name: Chronic Necrotic
description:
Hand Ability: If a Chaos Phantom would Break, instead Discard this card.

Field Ability: If this card defeats a Phantom in Battle, that Phantom is added to the owner Chronic Necrotic’s hand.

AL Ability: If a Phantom would be sent to the AL, instead place that card and this card onto the bottom of their owner’s deck.

name: City Of Tomorrow
description: Spirit cards within the Environment Range are shuffled back into the deck instead of Breaking.

name: Cityscape
description: The first Phantom card Broken per-turn for each Player within the Environment Range is shuffled back into the deck instead.

name: Clarity Purveyor
description: Flip: Targeted Break a face down card.

name: Clawing Shadows
description:
Target a face up Phantom Card. It loses 100 Attack for every Shadow Phantom in the AL or Shadow Realm.

Banish this card when it leaves the Field.

Shadow Realm Ability:
Condition: This card is not Shadow Sealed.
Cost: Shadow Seal it.

Select a Shadow Card from the Shadow Realm to add to your hand.

name: Clear Being
description:
At the end of the Round this card’s level increases by 1. This Ability applies while face down.
If this Ability goes off gain the following Break Impowering: Gain 1 SP.

name: Coded Injection
description:
Equip: When Equipped to an Ally Card increase its Attack by 500.
When Equipped to an Enemy Card decrease it’s Attack by 500.

name: Collateral Damage
description: If a Chaos card would Break, instead the opponent Targets another card to Break in its place.

name: Column Breaker
description:
Condition: All slots in this card’s column have a card in them.
Break all cards in this column.

name: Consuming Void
description:
Cards that are Attacked by this card are instead Bounced.
If a card loses Battle against this card it is Banished.
This card gains 100 Attack for every card in the Shadow Realm.

name: Copy Cat
description:
Condition: Turn Start activate this card.
Create a Copy of the first Phantom your opponent plays and give it Summon Binding.
If they don’t play a Phantom, send this card to the After Life.

name: Copying Cat
description: Flip: Create a Copy of this card.

name: Corner Trap
description:
Condition: A Face Down Phantom Flips up.
Targeted Break that card.

name: Corrupted Cultivation
description:
Equip: Increase the Equipped card’s Attack by 1000.
Turn End: The Equipped Card’s Attack goes back to normal, and then it loses 1000 Stat Points.

name: Cosmic Balancer
description:
Cycle. Equip Card.
On Summon: This card gains 500 stats for every Cosmic Phantom in the AL.
You can Destroy a card Equipped to this card instead of Destroying a Cosmic Phantom Card in your AL.

3-AP.
● AP: Destroy a Cosmic Phantom in your AL. Targeted Break a face down card.
● AP: Destroy two Cosmic Phantoms in your AL. Targeted Banish a card.
● AP: Destroy three Cosmic Phantoms in your AL. Targeted Break a card. Your opponent selects a card in their hand to Destroy.

name: Cosmic Balancing
description:
Your opponent selects 3 cards from their Deck.
You then choose each card individually to be sent into the AL, Shadow Realm, and Oblivion, respectively.
This Ability then activates for your opponent, but you may only select Cosmic cards.

name: Cosmic Binding
description:
Condition: An Enemy Phantom would leave the field from a means other than being Unsummoned.
Negate its Abilities and reduce its Stats to zero.
It becomes Field Locked for 3 Turns. At the end of 3 turns Break that card, or Equip it to an Ally Cosmic Phantom.

name: Cosmic Command
description:
Cost: Discard at least 1 Cosmic card and however many other cards on your side of the field.
Gain 1-SP for each discarded card.

Target an Enemy Phantom of equal or less summoning points than you currently have.
Equip this card to it and take control of them.

Lose any leftover summoning points gained by this card.

name: Cosmic Control
description:
Condition: Have a Cosmic card in either hand, field, or AL.
Target a level 4 or lower Enemy Phantom to Equip to, then pay summoning points equal to the Target, and take control of that Phantom.

name: Cosmic Rebalance
description:
Condition: Control a Cosmic Phantom Card.
If your opponent has more Phantoms on the field than you, have them be returned to the opponents hand in order of Level from lowest to highest, until they have the same number of Phantoms.

name: Cosmic Redeemer
description:
Equip Card.
When this Card Breaks a card that card can be Equipped to this card.

1-AP.
● AP: Discard a Card Equipped to this card. Gain 1-SP.
● AP: Discard two Cards Equipped to this card. Draw a card.
● AP: Discard three Cards Equipped to this card. Target a card to Break.

name: Cosmic Relativity
description: When an Ally Cosmic Phantom engages in Battle, swap the Stats of the two Battling Phantoms.

name: Cosmic Required
description:
When an Ally Cosmic Phantom would Break, the break is negated and this card is equipped to it.
Equipped: Each time the Equipped card would Break you can instead Detach a card Equipped to it.

name: Cosmic Tie
description:
When an Enemy Phantom would Break or be Discarded, instead negate it’s Abilities and Equip it to an Ally Cosmic Phantom.
This card also Equips to the Selected Phantom.

name: Cosmic Twinkle
description:
Equip Card.
Equipped: This card’s Stats are added to the Equipped Card.
Once per turn you can target a face down card on the field and Reveal it.

name: Cosmic View
description: For every Cosmic Card you control, select cards in your opponent’s hand for them to reveal. If you Reveal every card in your opponent’s hand, they can choose a card to place back onto either the top or bottom of their deck.

name: Cosmic Watcher
description:
Equip Card.
This card gains 1-AP for every card equipped to it.
When this Card Breaks a card that card can be Equipped to this card.

● AP: Target an Enemy Phantom to switch to Defense position.
● Cost 2 AP: Target an Enemy Phantom and flip it face down.
● Cost 3 AP: Target an Enemy Phantom and take control of it.

name: Counter Break Counter
description:
Condition: One of your set Spirit/Counter cards is Targeted for a Break by an Ability.
Negate that Break and if you do Break the negated card.

name: Counter Draw
description:
Condition: The opponent draws a card.
Draw a card.

name: Coup D'etat
description:
Discard 2 cards from your hand and draw 3.
If your hand has no cards to Discard, draw 5 cards and then Discard 3.

name: Creation Fairy
description:
When this card is summoned, Create a level 0 Creation Sprite.

1-AP per round.
● AP: This card can Attack twice.
● AP: Unsummon an Ally Creation Sprite and Search a copy of it.

name: Creation Genie
description:
When this card is summoned, Create 3 Level-1 Creation Sprite Phantoms.

3-AP per Round.
● AP: Break a Creation Sprite and then Search a copy of it.
● AP: Break a Creation Spright and then draw a card.

● AP: Break a Creation Spright and then Targeted Deal 1000 damage.
● AP: Break a Creation Sprite and then flip a card face down for the rest of the turn.

● AP: Break two Creation Spright Phantoms and then Targeted Break a card.

name: Creation Nymph
description:
When this card is summoned, Create a level 0 Creation Fairy Phantom.

1-AP per turn.
● AP: Negate an Attack.
● AP: Unsummon an Ally Creation Fairy and Search a copy of it.
● AP: Attack Directly.

name: Creation Sprite
description: When summoned Create a 0-SP Copy.

name: Creation Stream
description:
Condition: A card is Created.

Put a Counter on this card for every card Created this Round. This card spends tokens for AP.
It can only activate each AP once per turn.

● 1-AP: Give a Creation Phantom 500 Attack.
● 2-AP: Excavate 1 card and if it is a Creation Phantom Draw it.
● 3-AP: Select a Creation Phantom and Search a copy of it.
● 4-AP: Give all face up Creation Cards Sturdy this turn.
● 5-AP: Select an Ally Creation Phantom and have them Activate their On Summon Creation Ability again.

name: Creative Burnout
description: Condition: When a Creation card you control Breaks. Instead return it to your deck and then draw a card.

name: Creative Inspiration
description: Unsummon an Ally Creation Phantom. Target a Phantom on the field of equal or less SP and Create a Copy of it.

name: Creative Overflow
description: Gain 1 SP for every Creation card Unsummoned this turn.

name: Crooks Freeze!
description: No face up cards can attack this Round.

name: Crossroads
description:
Instant Play On Draw: Look at the top zero-to-three cards of your deck.
Choose one to draw and place the other(s) on the bottom of your deck.
Pay 1000 for each card revealed. Skip your next draw phase.

name: Crystal Elemental
description:
Field Ability: Targeted Dodge Roll.
Balance Ability: Sturdy. You can Attack Directly.
Once Per Round When an Ally card Activates an Ability in the Balance Slot, you can Targeted Break a Spirit Card.

name: Curious Spright
description: Pay 1000-to-3000 LP. Excavate 1 card for every 1000 LP paid. You may Draw 1 Excavated Life Phantom.

name: Cyber Space
description: Players within the Environment Range gain +1 Summoning Point per turn.

name: Cycle
description: Draw a card. Once per turn.

name: Dark Veiling Cloak
description:
Condition: An enemy Phantom targets a Shadow card for an Attack.
This card becomes a Shadow 0/0/0 Token.
Select this card and any number of Ally Shadow Phantoms to flip face down.
Shuffle the selected cards and place them back onto your side of the field in any position.

name: Deadly Bargain
description:
Condition: Control a Death card.
Spend any number of Summoning Points to Discard an equal number of cards from the top of your Deck.
Then Select a Discarded card and add it to your hand.

name: Death & Rebirth
description:
Break a selected Ally Phantom card.
During the start of the same phase of the next turn, Special Resurrect it from the After Life.

name: Death Mark
description:
Condition: Have a Death card on the field or in the AL.
Target a Phantom Card on the field, it is Marked to be Discarded at the end of the Round.

name: Deathly Apparition
description:
Hand & Field Ability: If a Death Phantom card is targeted for Battle, Discard this card and increase that card by 500 Attack.
AL Ability: Once Per Duel you can Special Summon this card and it gains Summon Binding. Immune to Targeted Break.

name: Deathly Shadow
description:
Fragile.
Hand & Field Ability: Discard this card.
AL Ability: Equip to a Death Phantom.
Equipped Ability: If the Equipped card would Break you can Banish this card and Negate the Break.

name: Deathly Specter
description: This card cannot be Attacked.

name: Deck Flip!
description:
Both Players flip their Decks upside down for the remainder of the duel.
If the card revealed by the flip is a Chaos card draw it.
All other Deck related Abilities are applied the same as before.

name: Deck Fusion
description: Shuffle your Side Deck into your Main Deck. Then draw a card.

name: Defending Growth
description: When a level 1 Life Phantom is Targeted for an Attack, Negate the Attack and gain LP equal to the Attacking Phantom.

name: Defenseless
description:
Target a Defense Position Phantom and have them changed to Attack Position.
If they cannot be changed to Attack Position Break that card.
If they are changed, apply Attack Position Sealed to them.

name: Desert
description: Players within the Environment Range take 500 damage each turn.

name: Destroyer’s Offering
description:
Whenever a Phantom card is Destroyed add a counter to this card. Max of five counters.
You can activate this card to turn the counters into Summoning Points. Then send this card to Oblivion.

name: Destruction Forager
description: Summon Binding. Break Impowering: Gain 1 SP.

name: Destruction Predator
description: Breaker. Destructive. Break a card from your hand or field, then Targeted Break a card. Destructive Surge: Gain 1-SP.

name: Destruction Ravager
description:
Breaker. Destructive.
This card gains an additional Attack for every Enemy Phantom.
Every time this card Breaks a Phantom in Battle, Destroy the top card of your opponent’s deck.
This card can initiate a Direct Attack the turn it is Summoned.
Break Impowering: Draw. Destructive Surge: Draw.

name: Destruction Scavenger
description: Break Impowering: Draw.

name: Destruction Stalker
description: Breaker. Destructive. Break Impowering: Your opponent picks a card in their hand to Break.

name: Destruction Trapper
description: Flip: Targeted Destroy. Summon Binding.

name: Destruction Viper
description: Breaker. Destructive. Break Impowering: Deal 200 damage to the opponent for every card in Oblivion.

name: Destruction Vulture
description:
Break Impowering: Targeted Destroy a card in the AL.
AL Ability: If this card’s Break Impowering Destroyed a card, you can Destroy this card and gain 1 SP.

name: Destructive Deal
description: Target an Ally Destruction Phantom and any number of Enemy Phantom Cards of equal or lessor SP total, Break all selected Cards.

name: Divesting Shadows
description:
Select an Ally Shadow Phantom and Target an Enemy Phantom of equal or less SP.
Bounce both cards.

name: Divination Cycle
description: Shuffle any number of cards from your hand back into your deck and draw an equal number of cards back.

name: Divine Light
description: Targeted Deal 500 Damage to an Enemy. Or give 500 Health to an Ally Light Card.

name: Dodge Roll!
description:
Condition: A Phantom that would be Broken.
Apply to it and Activate Dodge Roll.

name: Draw Counter
description:
Condition: The opponent draws a card.
The opponent Discards that card.

name: Draw Deduction
description: Declare 1 card name, if that card is on the top of your Deck Draw it.

name: Dream Eater
description: Flip: Targeted Discard.

name: Earth Elemental
description:
Field Ability: Sturdy.
Balance Ability: This card’s Attack is equal to its health while in Defense Position.

name: Elemental Totem
description:
Select one of the Four Elements. This card gains that Archetype Branch.
Other cards with the same Architype as this Card’s Archetype-Branches gain 500 attack.

name: Emergency Diffusion
description:
Condition: If a Fusion Phantom would Break in battle, or by card effect.
Discard that Phantom Card, then resummon the fusion materials used to summon the Phantom card.
Dodge.

name: Endurance Test
description:
When a direct attack is issued, you can activate this card. Both players send the top five cards of their deck to the AL.
Once per turn.

name: Equipment Sabotage
description:
Condition: An Equip card is Equipped or has an Ability Activate.
Fully Negate all face up Equip Cards for the rest of this turn.

name: Field Of Whispers
description:
This card cannot be activated the turn it is played.
Players in the Environment Range can activate this Card’s Ability.
Gain a Summoning Point.

name: Fire Elemental
description:
Field Summon: Targeted Deal 500 damage.
Balance Summon: This card loses 1000 attack. Targeted Deal this card’s Attack.

name: Flicker Shade
description: Shadow Step.

name: Forgotten Statuary Hall
description: Players in the Environment Range Draw a card from their Side Deck instead during the Draw Phase.

name: Fusion Kit
description: Send two Fusion Material Phantoms from your field to the AL, then Special Summon a Fusion Card.

name: Gracious Deal
description: Both Players Draw 2 cards. Once per duel.

name: Guiding Light
description: Excavate 3 cards. You may Draw 1 Excavated Light Card.

name: Hand Remake
description:
Cost: Reduce your current SP to zero.
Place all the cards in your hand onto the bottom of your deck.
Draw the same number of cards back.
Pay 500 LP for each card drawn.
Once per duel.

name: Hand Seal
description: Select a card in your Opponent’s Hand and Hand Seal it for the rest of this turn.

name: Happy To Be Alive
description:
Whenever a Life card is taken out of the AL, add a counter to this card.

3-AP per turn.
● AP: Spend 1 Counter and Add a level 3 or lower Life card from the AL to the hand.
● AP: Spend 2 Counters and Draw a card.
● AP: Spend 3 counters and Search the Side deck for a Life Phantom.

name: Hateful Retribution
description:
Discard Impowering: Your opponent must Discard one of their own cards from where ever this card was Discarded from.
Field Ability: If this Card Breaks, your opponent must choose one of their own Cards to Break.

name: Healing Tears
description: When a Life Phantom would Break, this card can be activated before the damage step. The Damage dealt for the rest of the turn is instead turned into LP that is added to the Player’s LP total.

name: Held By Memories
description:
If your LP would be reduced to zero, gain 1000 LP for every Phantom in your After Life.
You can then select any number of Death Phantoms in your AL to be After Life Sealed.
For every Phantom After Life Sealed this way, draw that many cards.
Your LP is reduced to zero at the end of your next turn.

name: Hoarder Counter
description:
Activate after the opponent has drawn a card, and they have more cards in hand than you.
The opponent chooses 1 card from their hand to shuffle back into their deck.

name: Hold Still!
description:
Targeted Break an Ally Phantom and then Targeted Break an Enemy Phantom.
Flavor: One Phantom holding another struggling Phantom from behind as a beam shoots through them.

name: Hourglass Of Time
description:
Draw 2 cards.
Lose your next 2 draw phases.
Lose half your life points.
You cannot attack the turn this card is activated.

name: I Didn’t Hear No Bell
description:
Phantoms you control survive each Break they receive this turn.
Every time they receive a Break they lose 3 Field SP.

name: Ice Elemental
description:
Sturdy.
Balance Ability: Once per round: When a card would be flipped up, you can flip it back down for the rest of the turn.

name: Illuminating Energy
description: Target an Ally Light Phantom. Discard them and then Draw 1 card for every two levels of the Target.

name: Imbuing Life
description: Give every Ally Life Phantom 500 Health.

name: Imposed Deduction
description:
Your opponent declares a Phantom Level from 1 to 4.
Draw cards from the top of your Deck until you draw a Phantom between Level 1-4.

If that Phantom is the same Level as the one declared by your opponent, Discard all drawn cards.
If not, Summon the drawn Phantom and then Discard the remaining cards.

name: Inspiring Creativity
description: Discard any number of Creation cards from your hand and field. Excavate that many cards. Draw each Creation Card Excavated.

name: Iron Defense
description:
Condition: An Ally face down Defense Position Phantom is Targeted for an Attack.
Double the Targeted Phantoms Attack during this Battle.

name: Kings’ Lead
description:
When your opponent activates a Spirit/Counter Card that would destroy a Phantom(s) on the field: Pay 2000 LP to Negate the activation, then destroy it.
Once per Round.

name: Land Of Radiance
description:
Both Players in the Environment Range Play with their hands Revealed.
Once per turn when an Ally Light Phantom leaves the field, look at the top card of your Deck.

name: Last Resort Comeback
description:
Condition: The combined total Attack of all enemy Phantom’s is higher than your LP.

Your opponent chooses one of their Phantoms and optionally any number more.
Each chosen Phantom will now Direct Attack. In the order of either lowest to highest or highest to lowest Attack, based on your opponent’s decision.
These Attacks can be reacted to and interacted with as normal.

Every time you take a Direct Attack this way, Draw a card, and Gain 1 SP on your turn.
If you Draw a copy of this Card the pervious Direct Attack Damage is reset to zero.

After all the Direct Attacks have resolved, gain 1000 LP for every Creation Phantom you Drew from this Card.

name: Last Strike!
description: Unsummon an Ally Phantom and Targeted Deal their Attack.

name: Lava Elemental
description:
On Summon: Targeted Deal 500 damage.
When this card Battles, cards on either side of the Battled Card take 500 damage.
Sturdy.

name: Law Of Death
description:
Condition: Your opponent tries to summon from or activate an Ability of a card in their AL.
Negate the activation.
If you control a Cosmic Phantom, that card in their AL becomes AL Sealed.

name: Law Of Shadow
description:
Condition: Your opponent tries to summon from or activate an Ability of a card in their Shadow Realm.
Negate the activation.
If you control a Cosmic Phantom, that card in their Shadow Realm becomes Shadow Sealed.

name: Life Bug
description: Pay LP in intervals of 100 up to 1000. This card gains Health Points equal to the Paid LP. Once per round.

name: Life Fairy
description:
Condition: A Life card is Targeted for Attack and would Break by the following Battle. You can Redirect the Attack to this card.
Summoner Damage from this Attack is instead turned into LP.

name: Life Genesius
description:
When a Life card Breaks, instead of sending it to the AL place it onto the bottom of the deck.
Once per Round Players can Reveal the bottom Card of their deck and if it is a Life Phantom Draw it.

name: Lifeful Wildflower
description:
This card can take the Battle for another Level 2 or lower Life Phantom.
Summoner Battle Damage is turned into LP.

name: Light Keeper
description: Blocker. Break Impowering: Target a card on field to Reveal, or have your Opponent choose a card in hand to Reveal.

name: Light Of Before
description: Excavate cards equal to the number of Light Phantoms in the AY.

name: Lighting Elemental
description:
When this card Battles, it’s Attack is also delt to the enemy Player.
When this card Breaks, it’s Attack is delt to the owning Player’s LP.

name: Luminescent Form
description: Stat Swap. Cycle.

name: Memories Of Four Elements
description:
Condition: Have at least one Phantom Card for each of the Four Elements in your AL.
Select 1-4 Elemental Phantom cards in your AL of 4 or less SP.
Create 4 Token Copies of the selected cards.

name: Messing Up The Balance
description:
Condition: Have two face up Chaos Phantoms in both your Balance Slots.
Cost: Negate their Abilities and set their stats to 0.

Give control of them to your opponent.
They are then Field Sealed for the next 3 turns.

name: Mirthful Luminescence
description:
1-AP Per Round.
● AP: Gain 500 Attack.
● AP: Gain 500 HP.
● AP: Lose 500 Stats and then Draw.

name: Mist Elemental
description: Targeted Dodge Roll. When this card would Break in Battle, Bounce it back to hand.

name: Mutual Defeat
description: Continuous Ability: While this card is face up on the field, for the next 3 turns damage dealt from a Direct Attack is dealt to both players at the same time.

name: Mutual Destruction
description: If a Destruction Phantom would be Defeated in Battle, add Breaker to it.

name: My Body Your Shield
description:
Condition: Your Phantoms must only be Level 1 or lower Life Phantoms.
For this turn, the first Attack directed at each of these Ally Life Phantoms are Redirect to Direct Attacks.

name: Nature’s Healing
description: Fully Heal all Life Phantoms on the field.

name: Negate Negation
description:
Condition: An enemy Ability would Negate one of your cards or Abilities.
Negate that Negate.

name: Nekomata
description: Field Ability: Condition: Breaks. Create a 1-SP Copy without this Ability.

name: Neurotic PrankStar
description: Chaos cards other than this one cannot be Targeted.

name: No Return
description:
When an Ally Death Phantom is Attacked, both cards are Marked with After Life Sealed.
Additionally both Cards are Marked for Discard at the end of the Turn.

name: No Support
description:
Condition: A Spirit or Counter Card is flipped up.
Targeted Break that Card.

name: Nothing
description:
On Summon: All cards on the field are Banished.
For every card Banished this way add a counter to this card.

While this card has Counters it has Summon Binding.
This card loses one Counter every turn.
You can Shadow Seal any number of the top cards from your Deck up to the number of Counters on this card, then remove an equal number of counters.

For every Counter this card loses deal 500 damage to both Players.
Shadow Seal this card when it leaves the field.

name: Oblivion Gate
description:
Add a counter to this card every time a card is Destroyed.
Once per Round You can Target a Phantom in the Environment range, remove counters from this card equal to the Target’s SP, then Targeted Break that card.
If you activate this Ability on an Ally Destruction Phantom Draw a card.

name: Oblivion Summoning
description: Select a Phantom in Oblivion to Summon. You can then select any number of cards you own to Break, and if you do reduce the selected Phantom’s SP by 1.

name: Open Ending
description:
Every time a card would leave the field, roll a 6-sided Die, and send the card to the corresponding location.

1: AL
2: Shadow Realm
3: Oblivion
4: Bottom of the main Deck.
5: Side Deck.
6: Extra Deck

name: Opposing Elements
description:
Field Ability: Face up Fire and Air Phantoms gain 500 Attack.
Balance Ability: Face up Earth and Water Phantoms gain 500 health.

name: Other Worldly Guardian
description:
Hand & Field Ability: If an Ally Death Phantom would Break, Discard this card and Negate that Break.
AL Ability: When an Ally Death Phantom engages in Battle, Banish this card, and give it 500 Attack.

name: Persistent Light
description: Shielded. Double Attack.

name: Phantom Binding
description:
Condition: Activate at the start of the Turn.
The first Phantom Summoned gains Summoning Binding.

name: Place Of Remembrance
description: When this card is played Draw a card. Players in the Environment Range Draw 2 cards during the Draw Phase.

name: Preparation Deduction
description:
Declare 1 card name, if that card is in your opponent's hand, they must discard that card and any other copies in their hand.
If not, you discard 1 card from your hand or field.

name: Preparation Draw
description: Select a card from your Side Deck and place it onto the top of your deck.

name: Prepared For Anything
description:
Condition: Have 10 or more cards in your side Deck.
Shuffle your side deck then draw a card from it.

name: Proxy War Insurgence
description:
Targeted Deal 500 Damage to your opponent for every card they control.
Then Targeted Deal 500 Damage to yourself for every card you control.

name: Psychopomp Of The Dead
description:
On Summon: You can select a Level 4 or lower Death card from your AL to Special Resurrect.

Once per turn: You can select a card in your opponent’s AL to Banish.
When this card Breaks a card it is sent to the bottom of the owner’s deck. If this card Breaks by a Card Ability that card is Discarded.

AL Ability: 1-AP per card.
● AP: Banish two pairs of cards in your AL up to four sets and receive SP for each pair banished.
● AP: Banish 8 Cards in your AL then Resurrect this card.

name: Quixotic Axolotl
description:
Roll a dice.

1: Unsummon this card.
2-5: Add a counter to this card equal to the Die roll.
6: Targeted Break another card. You can detach any number of counters on this card to increase the roll by the number of counters removed.

You can remove 6 counters from any Ally card to activate this Ability an additional time.

name: Re-Creation
description:
Condition: Have a Creation card in hand or on your Field.
Select a Phantom Card in either Player’s AL, pay SP equal to that card’s total, Create a Copy of that card. This Creation gains the Creation Archetype.

name: Re-Life
description: If a Life Phantom would Break, instead return it to the owners hand. Half the Phantom’s SP are given to the Player on their turn.

name: Red Wire Time Bomb
description:
You can select any number of your cards face down in the Backrow.
Select this card and Flip it face down.
Shuffle the selected cards in the Backrow.

Your opponent can select one of their Phantoms in their Front-row and move it over by 1 to an available Front-row slot.

At the end of the turn this card Reveals itself and explodes.
Dealing 500 damage for every card shuffled or moved -- to the column it is currently occupying.

name: Reincarnation
description: Select a Phantom from your After Life to add back into your hand.

name: Return From Shadow
description:
Select a Shadow Phantom from the Shadow Realm. Shadow Seal cards in your AL or Shadow Realm equal to its SP.
Special Summon the selected card in three turns.

name: Rising To The Creation
description: Create a level 0 Creation Sprite for every Phantom Card your opponent controls.

name: Sacrificial Pawn
description: If a Phantom card would Break in battle, instead summon a 0/500 token that the attack is directed at instead.

name: Salient Sentry
description:
Cycle.
1-AP Per Round.
● AP: Targeted Deal 1000 Damage.
● AP: Targeted Break a Facedown Card.
● AP: Lose 2 levels and gain 2 AP.

name: Sand Ambler
description:
Blocker.
When this card is sent to the AL, you can Search a Desert Environment from your Deck or Side Deck.

name: Sarpanch Ayah
description:
While your LP is higher than your opponent's, all Ally Life Phantoms gain 500 Attack.
Your opponent cannot Target level 1-3 Life Phantoms for Attack.
Condition: You gain LP. Once per turn Special Summon a Level 1 Life Phantom from the AL.

name: Sealing Amulet
description: Search a level 4 or lower Shadow Phantom to Shadow Seal. At the start of your next turn, if this card is still on the field, add that card to your hand.

name: Second Chance!
description: Target all Life cards in both Players’ After Life, shuffle them all back into the owner’s decks.

name: Seeking Balance
description:
You can only use one of this card’s Abilities per Turn.
Field Ability: Draw 1-2 Copies of this Card.

Balance Ability: If you play one copy of this card you can select move An Ally card to one of your open Balance Slots (including this Card’s slot).
And then if you do you can move an Enemy card to one of your opponent’s available Balance Slots.

If you play a copy of this card in both Balance Slots you can select two Ally Elemental Phantoms of 4 or less SP and which have different Architype Branches.
You can then Special Summon a Phantom which has a combined SP equal to or less than the selected cards total, and that has Archetype Branches which contain all Branches of the two select cards.

If you Special Summon a card this way, discard the selected Phantoms.

name: Self-Destruct
description: Condition: Both players are below 2500 Life Points. Deal 2500 damage to each player.

name: Self-Destruction
description:
Condition: An Ally Phantoms is Targeted for an Attack.
Deal double the Targeted Phantom’s Attack to both Phantoms.

name: Serving Glow
description: Excavate 3 cards. You may Draw 1 Excavated Light Phantom.

name: Shadow Bind
description: When an enemy Phantom targets a Shadow card for an Attack, flip that Phantom face down.

name: Shadow Blink
description: Choose one face up Shadow Phantom you control, Banish it until this turn is over.

name: Shadow Eater
description: This card gains the Attack of any card it Breaks.

name: Shadow Field
description: Cards within the Environment Range that would be sent to the AL are instead Banished.

name: Shadow Pact
description:
Can only be activated while a Shadow card is on the field.
Both players Banish a card from their hand, then Search for a card to draw from either their Main Deck or Side Deck.

name: Shadow Stealer
description: Flip: Targeted Banish.

name: Shadowy Spirit
description: Stealth.

name: Shot Rebound
description:
Condition: Take Direct Damage.
Deal the damage taken back to the opponent.

name: Sky Fall
description:
You can place this Counter Card face down in the Environment Slot.

Field Ability:
Condition: Control an Environment Card.
Cost: Targeted Break your Environment card. Break all copies of this Counter Card in your deck or hand.

Optional: If you Break at least one other copy of this card, Targeted Break your opponent’s Environment Card, and then both players Search an Environment Card.

Environment Slot Ability:
Condition: Your opponent activates the Ability of an Environment.
Targeted Break that card.

name: Smiting Light
description:
Add a counter to this card for every Light Card in the AY.
Once per Round Ability: Remove up to 5 Counters from this card and Deal 200 damage to the Opponent per counter removed.

name: Snake Pit
description:
Target a Field Slot to Mark until the end of the turn.
Any card in that field Slot is Marked with Poisoned and will lose 500 HP every turn.

name: Song Of Healing
description: Gain 1000 LP for every Life Phantom on the field.

name: Speaker To Life
description: Select a level 1 Life Phantom in the AL and Resurrect it. Once Per Summon.

name: Special Summon
description:
Choose an Ally Phantom card and send it to the AL.
Special Summon a Phantom Card of equal or less SP and which has the same Archetype.
Once per Round.

name: Spike Trap
description:
All Slots in this Column are Marked until the end of the turn.
Any Phantom in the Marked slots will be dealt 500 Damage any time they take a game action.

name: Spirit Destruction
description: Target 1-5 cards from your AL and Destroy them.

name: Spirit Give
description: Select Death Phantoms from your AL in pairs of two up to four pairs and Shadow Seal them. Gain 1 SP for each pair banished.

name: Spirit Swapper
description: Spirit cards that would affect the currently activating Player are applied to the Enemy Player instead.

name: Spy Vs. Spy
description:
Both Players choose 5 cards from their deck, each Player selects 1 of their opponent’s chosen cards and that card is then added to the respective Player’s hand.

The opponent shuffles their cards back.
The activating Player Oblivion Seals their remaining cards.
You cannot Attack the turn this Ability is activated.
Once Per Game.

name: Steal From The Rich!
description:
During your opponent’s draw phase, activate this card if their hand has three more cards in it than yours.
The opponent chooses one card to give to the activating player.

name: Steam Elemental
description:
Field Summon: Targeted Deal 500 damage. When this card Breaks, Search another copy of it.

Balance Summon: This card loses 1000 attack. Targeted Deal this card’s Attack.
Damage dealt to this Card’s Health in Battle is also dealt to the Battler.

name: Stimulant Booster
description: Equip: Choose to either increase the Equipped card’s Attack or Health by 500.

name: Summoner Overdrive
description:
Condition: This card cannot be activated the same turn the player Unsummons.
Gain 4-SP.
You cannot gain any SP your next turn.
Any card summoned this turn after activating this card is discarded at Turn end.
Lose 2000 LP your next turn.
Once per turn.

name: Summoner’s Draw
description: Pay 4-SP and draw 2 cards.

name: Summoners’ Pact
description:
Lose 2000 LP. Gain 2-SP.
Your opponent gains 4-SP their next turn. Once per turn.

name: Summoning Auditorium
description: Players in the Environment Range Draw from the opponent’s deck.

name: Summoning Library
description:
When this card is played Draw a card.
This card cannot be activated the turn it is played.
Players in the Environment Range can activate this Card’s Ability.
Both Players draw a card.

name: Summoning Point Parasite
description:
Condition: Direct Attacks the opponent.
They lose 1 SP on their turn.
The owning player gains 1 SP their next turn.

name: Taking Shape
description:
Condition: An Ally Creation Phantom would Break by Battle.
Break that Ally Phantom, Dodging the Battle, and Special Summon a Creation Phantom of equal or less SP with its Abilities Negated.

name: Tar Trap
description:
Select a Slot to Mark until the end of the turn.
Any Phantom while in this Marked Slot loses 500 Attack and cannot Attack this turn.

name: The Burning Truth
description:
Target an Enemy Face down Phantom.
Flip it up and Negate it’s Flip Ability.

If you control a Light Phantom you can Targeted Deal its Attack to that Phantom.

name: Those Who Give Life
description:
While your LP is higher than your opponent's:
You may Select Life Phantoms in the AL and pay 1000 LP per SP they have and then Special Summon them.
This card gains 500 Stats for every 1000 LP paid.

While your LP is lower than your opponent's:
Damage dealt to this card is instead directly dealt to the owning Player.
This Card cannot be Targeted by Abilities. This card cannot target a Phantom for Attack.
Direct Attack Damage by this Card is not delt, the owner gains LP equal to this card’s Attack.

name: Token Creation
description: Create two 0-SP 0/0 Tokens.

name: Tournament Arena
description: When a Phantom Card would Break by Battle, instead bounce it back to the owner's hand.

name: Trading Cards
description:
Each player selects a card in hand to give to the other player.
If another Chaos card is face up on the field, return this card to the owner’s hand.
Once per turn.

name: Trolly Problem
description:
Choose 5 cards from your deck, your opponent chooses which card is added to your hand.
The other 4 cards are Oblivion Sealed.

On your opponent’s next turn, this Ability activates for them, except 2 Cards must be selected to be added to their hand.

Once Per Game.

name: True Destruction
description: The first card sent to the AL each turn is Destroyed instead.

name: Unity Against Division
description:
Condition: An enemy Phantom declares an Attack.

Targeted Break any number of Ally Phantoms.

Your Opponent Selects the same number of their own Phantoms to Break.

name: Vengeance Of The Dead
description:
If an Ally Death card is Defeated in Battle, the card that Defeated it will Break at the end of the Round.
The Ally Death card is then added back to the hand.

name: Vengeful Shade
description: When an Ally Shadow card Breaks from an Ability, Banish both cards.

name: Vesting Life Force
description: Gain LP equal to the combined total Health of all Ally Life Phantoms.

name: Water Elemental
description:
Field Ability: When this card Breaks, Search another copy of it.
Balance Ability: Damage dealt to this Card’s Health in Battle is also dealt to the Battler.

name: White Flag Counter
description:
After Life Seal all cards in hand.
For each card Sealed, draw that many more in your next draw phase.
Your opponent’s first Battle of the turn is negated.

Optional: Select a Phantom Card on your field, to have it Direct Attack the opponent and be Discarded after the attack.
Cost: The opponent can select one of your field cards to be Discarded.

name: Will From Beyond
description:
Select a Phantom from the After Life and Resurrect it for 1-turn at summoning cost.
At the end of the turn, if it is still on the field, After Life Seal it.

name: Wretched Deduction
description:
At the start of your turn, select a card from the opponent’s hand and predict what type of card it is (Phantom, Spirit, Counter).
The opponent shows the card.
If you guessed correctly, deal 1000 damage to the opponent.
Once per turn.

name: You’ll Pay For This!
description: If a card Breaks in battle, select another card you control and increase their Stat Points by 1000.
